lead_paragraph: Russian and Syrian forces will pause their offensive on Oct. 20 to allow civilians and rebels to leave the city and to provide humanitarian relief, a Russian military official said.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

headline.main: Assault on Aleppo Will Halt for 8 Hours, Russia Says

snippet: Russian and Syrian forces will pause their offensive on Oct. 20 to allow civilians and rebels to leave the city and to provide humanitarian relief, a Russian military official said....
